selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract dimensions of the rectangle from the diagram image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the lengths of sides AB and BC from the image.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the perimeter of the rectangle using the extracted dimensions.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Apply the formula 2 * (length + width) using the extracted lengths.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the calculated perimeter as 'Answer: ...'.
